attributes.additional_details: Allotment prices in this region have risen beyond any other prices I know of.  For a 200 meter squared allotment (enough to support one person) the yearly charge is now £91.  I have heard that further price rises may occur next year, possibly hiking the prices to around £116.  Please, can you do something to reduce this outrageous pricing, a cap on this amount would be sufficient as it means that unemployed or low waged allotment tenants can still afford the rent.
